alert.note: Alert for Angelina; Houston; Polk; Trinity; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 9:06PM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River Near Diboll affecting Tyler, Trinity, Angelina, Polk and Houston Counties. For the Neches River...including Lake Palestine, Neches, Alto, Diboll, Rockland...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neches River Near Diboll. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs. Expect flooded boat ramps and trails. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 12.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CDT Thursday was 12.8 feet and very near crest. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 12.0 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Friday evening at 900 PM CDT.
